sn2.27:1.1: Standing to one side, the god Nanda recited this verse in the Buddha’s presence:
sn2.27:2.2: the stages of life leave us one by one.
sn2.27:2.4: you should do good deeds that bring happiness.”
sn2.27:3.2: the stages of life leave us one by one.
sn2.27:3.4: one looking for peace would drop the world’s bait.”
